name: Alexander
ingredients: 30 ml Cognac|30 ml Crème de Cacao (Brown)|30 ml Fresh Cream
instructions: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes.
short_description: A classic modern cocktail made with Cognac, recognized by the International Bartenders Association.

name: Bloody Mary
ingredients: 45 ml Vodka|90 ml Tomato Juice|15 ml Fresh Lemon Juice|2 dashes Worcestershire Sauce
instructions: Stir gently all the ingredients in a mixing glass with ice, pour into rocks glass.

name: Bramble
ingredients: 50 ml Gin|25 ml Fresh Lemon Juice|12.5 ml Sugar Syrup|15 ml Crème de Mûre
instructions: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker except the Crème de Mûre, shake well with ice, strain into chilled old fashioned glass filled with crushed ice, then pour the blackberry liqueur (Crème de Mûre) over the top of the drink, in a circular motion.
short_description: A classic modern cocktail made with Gin, recognized by the International Bartenders Association.
seo_description: Learn how to make a Bramble with Gin. Official IBA Modern cocktail recipe with ingredients and step-by-step instructions.
